title: The Knight Commission on Intercollegiate Athletics
itunes:title: The Knight Commission on Intercollegiate Athletics
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Amy Perko, CEO of the Knight Commission on Intercollegiate Athletics as they discuss the ever-changing landscape of college sports. Plus what's next for NIL regulations, College Football conferences, and whether schools are prioritizing education of their athletes. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
